<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Reptile Rider](/Feats.aspx?ID=2404) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lizardfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=226" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 46 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

To you, crocodilians, giant lizards, and dinosaurs are loyal steeds, not monsters. You gain the [Ride](/Feats.aspx?ID=835) feat, even if you don't meet the prerequisites. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) checks to [Handle an Animal](/Traits.aspx?ID=9) as long as the animal is a reptile, [dinosaur](/Traits.aspx?ID=45), or even a non-sapient [dragon](/Traits.aspx?ID=50).
name: Reptile Rider
